snippet.title: Basic technique for stir-frying chicken in 3 min
snippet.description:
RECIPE TITLE: Basic technique for stir-frying chicken in 3 min

INGREDIENTS
2 tbsp canola oil
1/2 cup of thinly sliced onion
8 oz of chicken

SEASONINGS
2 tbsp of oyster sauce
1 tbsp of soy sauce
3 tsp sugar
2 1/2 tsp of cornstarch
2 tbsp of dark soy sauce

INSTRUCTIONS
 1. Add 2 tbsp of canola oil.  
 2. Add 1/4 cup of thinly sliced onion.
 3. Add 8 oz of chicken
 4. Stir-fry for 60 sec until chicken is done.
 5. Add 2 tbsp of oyster sauce
 6. Stir-fry for 15 sec.
 7. Add 1 tbsp of soy sauce.
 8. Stir-fry for 15 sec.
 9. Turn off the heat
 10. Add 3 tsp of sugar
 11. Mix and taste
 12. Sprinkle 2 tsp of cornstarch
 13. Add 2 tbsp of dark soy sauce
 14. Turn the heat back on.
 15. Add another tsp of dark so sauce.
 16. Add 1 tbsp of scallion
 17. Dish serve.
 18. Garnish with scallion

snippet.title: The Complete Sausage Making Masterclass, Step By Step. #SRP
snippet.description:
How To Make Sausages.An in depth video showing the whole process of making your own sausages,from start, to the finished product, we talk about the ingredients, the equipment you need and  where you can get it from, then how to make proper butchers sausages.This is the ultimate, and most detailed video on sausage making. Below is the link for my sausage linking/tying video,and  links of the companies i use to purchase the equipment needed and the ingredients.

How To Make Pork,Apple And Cider Sausage.
https://youtu.be/pTBW-6-b60M

How To Link/Tie Sausages....
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UY5TiciEry4

Weschenfelder sausage making supplies..
https://www.weschenfelder.co.uk/

Dalziel Butchers sundries.
http://www.dalziel.co.uk/

Lucas Sausage Seasonings..
http://www.lucas-ingredients.co.uk/sausage-seasonings-mixes.htm

Sausage Recipe...
3.5lbs of pork 70% lean 30% fat.
0.5lbs/8oz of sausage making rusk.
2oz of sausage seaSoning of choice.
1lb (weighed) of ice cold water.
1lb of fresh leeks.

Please Subscribe to my channel by clicking on the link below, as new videos released every week.

 http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=thescottreaproject

https://twitter.com/ScottReaProject?lang=en

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Thescottreaproject/132366100270676

Below is the link for my sausage linking/tying video,and  links of the companies i use to purchase the equipment needed and the ingredients.

How To Make Pork,Apple And Cider Sausage.
https://youtu.be/pTBW-6-b60M

How To Link/Tie Sausages....
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UY5TiciEry4

Weschenfelder sausage making supplies..
https://www.weschenfelder.co.uk/

Dalziel Butchers sundries.
http://www.dalziel.co.uk/

Lucas Sausage Seasonings..
http://www.lucas-ingredients.co.uk/sausage-seasonings-mixes.htm

Sausage Recipe...
3.5lbs of pork 70% lean 30% fat.
0.5lbs/8oz of sausage making rusk.
2oz of sausage seaSoning of choice.
1lb (weighed) of ice cold water.
1lb of fresh leeks.

Please Subscribe to my channel by clicking on the link below, as new videos released every week.

 http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=thescottreaproject

https://twitter.com/ScottReaProject?lang=en

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Thescottreaproject/132366100270676

snippet.title: Basic technique for stir-frying chicken in 3 min
snippet.description:
RECIPE TITLE: Basic technique for stir-frying chicken in 3 min

INGREDIENTS
2 tbsp canola oil
1/2 cup of thinly sliced onion
8 oz of chicken

SEASONINGS
2 tbsp of oyster sauce
1 tbsp of soy sauce
3 tsp sugar
2 1/2 tsp of cornstarch
2 tbsp of dark soy sauce

INSTRUCTIONS
 1. Add 2 tbsp of canola oil.  
 2. Add 1/4 cup of thinly sliced onion.
 3. Add 8 oz of chicken
 4. Stir-fry for 60 sec until chicken is done.
 5. Add 2 tbsp of oyster sauce
 6. Stir-fry for 15 sec.
 7. Add 1 tbsp of soy sauce.
 8. Stir-fry for 15 sec.
 9. Turn off the heat
 10. Add 3 tsp of sugar
 11. Mix and taste
 12. Sprinkle 2 tsp of cornstarch
 13. Add 2 tbsp of dark soy sauce
 14. Turn the heat back on.
 15. Add another tsp of dark so sauce.
 16. Add 1 tbsp of scallion
 17. Dish serve.
 18. Garnish with scallion
